Moving to (3, 3) requires 1 green chip, which I can afford. This move will allow me to reach my goal in one step. My score will be 20 (for reaching goal) + 5 * (9 B + 1 G + 0 R) = 20 + 5*10 = 70 points. There is no benefit to delaying this move, and no need to trade since I already have the required chip. The contract where I owe the other player 20 points if I reach my goal does not change this decision — even after paying 20, my effective score is 50, which is still better than 0 if I don’t move. Thus, strictly maximizing my own outcome.
